dd.p: This update provides support for the XDocsFMx 2.0 connector providing DITA 1.2 features with the XDocs CMS.

dlentry.dt: Keyrefs to a topic now use title text, also provides alt text support

dd.p: When the associated keydef for a key element reference (like a keyword) does not define topicmeta content, the effective element content is now pulled from the topic title referenced by the keydef href. Also, key element references can make use of alternative text when no topicmeta content is defined.
The Generate Book from Map command can now handle more complex directory structures than in previous releases. A topicref/@href that starts with a “..\” should resolve properly now.

dlentry.dt: Conrefs to figs are not deleted when using the Move Figure Title option

dd.p: Previously, when using the “Move Figure Titles” option for book-builds, a conref to a fig would result in that element being deleted from the output. This has been fixed.

dlentry.dt: Insert Key Element Reference dialog supports multiple keyspaces

dd.p: Available keys are now properly updated when a different keyspace is selected.

dlentry.dt: Using keyrefs with images on Windows Vista/7/8

dd.p: Images that use a keyref with no href fallback should work properly now on Windows Vista/7/8.

dlentry.dt: Update References: xref option works properly

dd.p: The Update References xref option no longer deletes xrefs.

dlentry.dt: Set Attributes dialog provides Edit INI button

dd.p: A new Edit INI button lets you easily make edits to the filtergroups.ini file to control filtering groups displayed in the dialog.
